name: Spines of Savages
flavorText: Tales recount of a great war where one barbarian took down four enemies in a single battle that led to the tribe's final victory.
flavorTextHtml: Tales recount of a great war where one barbarian took down four enemies in a single battle that led to the tribe's final victory.

primary.textHtml: +[91 - 100] Resistance to All Elements

setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Double the effectiveness of shouts. You deal double damage to Feared, Frozen, or Stunned enemies.(4) Set:     
 Each Frenzy stack reduces damage taken by 6%. Frenzy lasts twice as long.(6) Set:     
 Frenzy deals 1000% increased damage per stack.

(6) Set:
